issue.title: Problem compiling against gazebo using pkg-config and a local sdformat install

content.raw:
Reading the whole thing, is there any reason why we are not using the ```Requires:``` clause in the gazebo.pc file so we delegate the sdformat values to the sdformat.pc file?

@iche033: could you modify the local gazebo.pc file, removing all references to sdformat and adding:

```
Requires: sdformat
```
